name: Click-o-Matic
short_description:
Version 1.5 is now out! 1st February 2015.

Click-o-Matic is an auto-clicker. What that means is that it performs a bunch of mouse clicks

automatically without you having to push any mouse buttons.

It is particularly useful in games where you have stacks of items in your inventory which you need to 

click to open or use, Click-o-Matic not only removes the need for you to manually click a few hundred 

times to use the stack, but it greatly increases the speed of which you are able to click. You can open a 

stack in a matter of seconds without you having to lift a finger.

Download the latest version here on SourceForge, or from my Google Drive:
https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B9Knx2Wu7rw-SlNFWWFMWGRKX1E&usp=sharing

Along with all the older versions.

-----------

Please report any bugs which you have found by opening a Ticket.
summary: Automatic clicker, mostly for game inventory management.
